match.schema:
type: object
additionalProperties: false
required:
  - period_seconds
  - auto_complete_delay
  - claim_info_batch_size
properties:
    period_seconds:
        type: integer
        x-taxi-cpp-type: std::chrono::seconds
    auto_complete_delay:
        type: integer
        x-taxi-cpp-type: std::chrono::seconds
    claim_info_batch_size:
        type: integer
        minimum: 1
        maximum: 1000
